description: Surrogate primary key for the resource record; unique identifier used for joins, indexing, and reference.
Deterministic content hash for the resource entry, used to de-duplicate and detect changes (likely SHA-1); confirm with SME.
Binary payload of the resource data compiled from RESX (magic 0xBEEFCACE suggests .NET .resources format), not plain XML; stores localized strings/assets; confirm with SME.
